des: "This is an authentic traditional 19th century English holiday drink.  It's best if you use fresh nutmeg only.  Make it and enjoy it while decorating the tree - it's incredibly delicious, rich and oh so addictive!"
ins: In a half gallon container, mix together the heavy cream, apple cider, milk, sugar, vanilla and nutmeg with a whisk. Serve immediately, or refrigerate overnight. Whisk again before serving.
